page.title: 04Adventure Playground,Marn'll
page.content: In Marnhull recreation ground there is an Adventure Playground.In it there is a big ship made of wood.It has a cabin and a ladder going up to the top deck.There are swings,slide and bars. There is a big hump of earth and it has two tunnels going through the middle.There is also a sandpit.There are logs you can climb and a climbing frame with netting.In the village hall the playgroup meets for three to four year olds.The parents of the playgroup built the adventure playground in 1980.Most of the materials to build it were given by local people and firms,so the cost was only Â£181.The playground won second prize in the Dorset Village Venture Competition in 1981 and was featured on TV when some of the infants from our school were seen playing on it.
